column4: I tried installing ubuntu without checking cd for defects. I'm running a live cd version with a wiped hdd and no way to burn a live cd unless I can somehow burn the disc through the livecd. Possible? Help!
I've never done it, but I think the livecd has everything you need to burn a CD,
I shall try to d/l then.
I'm not sure where you'll find 600M to put the CD contents
